        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Seeing things in colour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen von von Sachen in der Farbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voir des choses en couleurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vendo coisas na cor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedere le cose a colori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει τα πράγματα στο χρώμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ver cosas en color</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that we see normal colours of things under white light (top). Colours of things look different under coloured light (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coloured light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">green light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">postbox</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">red light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß wir normale Farben 
von Sachen unter weißes Licht (Oberseite) sehen. Farben von 
Sachen schauen unter farbigem Licht (Unterseite) unterschiedlich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que nous voyons des 
couleurs normales des choses sous la lumière blanche (dessus). 
Les couleurs des choses semblent différentes sous la lumière 
colorée (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que nós vemos cores 
normais das coisas sob a luz branca (alto). As cores das coisas 
olham diferentes sob a luz colorida (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che vediamo i colori 
normali delle cose sotto luce bianca (parte superiore). I colori
delle cose sembrano differenti sotto luce colorata (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι βλέπουμε τα 
κανονικά χρώματα των πραγμάτων κάτω από το άσπρο φως (κορυφή). 
Τα χρώματα των πραγμάτων φαίνονται διαφορετικά κάτω από το
χρωματισμένο φως (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que vemos colores 
normales de cosas bajo luz blanca (tapa). Los colores de 
cosas parecen diferentes bajo luz coloreada (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">farbiges Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grünes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
